pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonlinear Calibration // Performs nonlinear calibration and curve fitting for data from Luminex, RT-PCR, ELISA, RPPA etc. Its precursor is Ruminex. This package is described in nCal: a R package for nonlinear calibration. Bioinformatics, DOI:10.1093/bioinformatics/btt456.
